a.n: Du Teweikan A L'Ã©lectro, Voyage Aux Sources De La Musique Autochtone

p.d: A journey to the roots of contemporary indigenous Quebec music, with the artistes Pakesso Mukash, Moe Clark and Shauit. Beneath the folk, electro or reggae tunes, the teweikan (traditional drum), works to build bridges between the generations, from Montreal to the Hudson Bay, from the plains to the northern coast. Directed by: Jim O'Bomsawin (Canada, 2018)
